lead_paragraph: Mrs. Clinton’s campaign opened a coordinated attack on Mr. Comey, the F.B.I. director, accusing him of smearing her with innuendo late in the race.

byline.contributor: Reporting was contributed by Yamiche Alcindor, Nick Corasaniti, Matt Flegenheimer, Jack Healy and Thomas Kaplan.
byline.original: By PATRICK HEALY and JONATHAN MARTIN

headline.print_headline: Clinton Shifts to Attack Mode on Email Issue
headline.main: Hillary Clinton Assails James Comey, Calling Email Decision ‘Deeply Troubling’

snippet: Mrs. Clinton’s campaign opened a coordinated attack on Mr. Comey, the F.B.I. director, accusing him of smearing her with innuendo late in the race....
abstract: Hillary Clinton campaign and its supporters assail Federal Bureau of Investigation director James B Comey for his controversial decision to suggest in letter to Congress that investigation into presidential candidate's emails may not be concluded after all; worries over disclosure's effect on election prompts frontal assault from campaign after initial reticence.
